hi i have a big problem: My feet are itchy. What's your problem?
I suggest you boot the liveCD, mount the installed filesystem including dev- and sys-binds and chroot to that root partition and do a dpkg-reconfigure grub2
http://karuppuswamy.com/wordpress/2010/06/02/how-to-chroot-to-ubuntu-using-live-cd-to-fix-grub-rescue-prompt/ should help you quite a long way.
